title: Elmer
description: Elmer the elephant is bright-colored patchwork all over. No wonder the other elephants laugh at him!If he were ordinary elephant color, the others might stop laughing. That would make Elmer feel better, wouldn't it? David McKee's comical fable about everyoneâ€™s favorite patchwork elephant teaches readers to be themselves and celebrates the power of laughter.
author: David McKee
